member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe
member.summary: Contains generic, low-level functionality for manipulating pointers.

member.summary: Reads a value of type from the given location.
member.param: The location to read from.
member.returns: An object of type read from the given location.

member.summary: Reads a value of type from the given location.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AsPointer``1(``0@)
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the given by-ref parameter.
member.param: The object whose pointer is obtained.
member.returns: A pointer to the given value.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.SizeOf``1
member.summary: Returns the size of an object of the given type parameter.
member.typeparam: The type of object whose size is retrieved.
member.returns: The size of an object of type .

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.As``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Casts the given object to the specified type, performs no dynamic type checking.
member.typeparam: The type which the object will be cast to.
member.param: The object to cast.
member.returns: The original object, casted to the given type.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AsRef``1(System.Void*)
member.summary: Reinterprets the given location as a reference to a value of type .
member.typeparam: The type of the interpreted location.
member.param: The location of the value to reference.
member.returns: A reference to a value of type .

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AsRef``1(``0@)
member.summary: Reinterprets the given read-only reference as a reference.
member.param: The read-only reference to reinterpret.
member.returns: A reference to a value of type .

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.As``2(``0@)
member.summary: Reinterprets the given reference as a reference to a value of type .
member.typeparam: The type of reference to reinterpret.
The desired type of the reference.
member.param: The reference to reinterpret.
member.returns: A reference to a value of type .

member.summary: Adds an element offset to the given reference.
member.param: The reference to add the offset to.
The offset to add.
member.returns: A new reference that reflects the addition of offset to pointer.

member.summary: Adds an element offset to the given pointer.

member.returns: A new pointer that reflects the addition of offset to pointer.

member.summary: Determines the byte offset from origin to target from the given references.

The reference to target.
member.returns: Byte offset from origin to target i.e. - .

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AreSame``1(``0@,``0@)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified references point to the same location.
member.param: The first reference to compare.
The second reference to compare.
member.returns: true if and point to the same location; otherwise false.
